long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your AnnoFrame workflow with our Chrome extension. Capture webpages with a single click and upload them directly to your AnnoFrame account for annotation.

AnnoFrame's intuitive tools empower you to highlight key areas with freehand drawings, add clear explanations with text boxes, and use shapes for emphasis.

Share annotated screenshots securely within AnnoFrame to foster seamless team collaboration.
